main_text:
Problems and Topics
3. Problems and Topics

The third section of this entry focuses on topics that have been of
particular concern to Latin American and Latino/a philosophers and
that have interest today. These topics offer a general picture of the
way these philosophers have approached philosophical problems.
Nevertheless, the issues canvassed here are, necessarily, an
inadequate representation of the diverse issues and approaches taken
up in Latin American 
philosophy.[7]
hierarchy_title: Latin American Philosophy || Problems and Topics
